newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak foreign minister says ready to join NATO.
newsitem.headline: Slovak foreign minister says ready to join NATO.

text.p: Doubts over Slovakia's readiness for NATO membership are unfounded, Foreign Minister Pavol Hamzik was quoted as saying on Tuesday.

In an interview with the independent daily Pravda, Hamzik also said he expected a big turnout in a planned referendum on Slovak membership of the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation, though he did not predict the result.
"(There are)...in my opinion unfounded doubts over Slovakia's preparedness for NATO membership and eventual membership of other integrated organisations," Hamzik said.
Slovakia has said it wants to be among the first wave of post-Communist countries admitted to the alliance and to the
